title: Enhancing Mathematical Spatial Reasoning Skills Through Embodied Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Linear algebra, basic geometry, and spatial visualization skills
context.additional_context: Learners access via smartphone-based video conferencing tools and must be able to engage in collaborative learning even in limited physical spaces.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three-dimensional geometric concepts by utilizing physical movements.
In the collaborative problem-solving process, spatial relationships can be communicated through verbal/non-verbal communication.
Can develop effective physical interaction strategies while adapting to various social relationships (interpersonal dynamics within a team)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
